//_MODEL_SETTINGS_: --- Controls for the 3D model file, scale, and orientation ---

modelFrontRotation.//_x_: Tilts the model UP (negative) or DOWN (positive) - 'Pitch'
modelFrontRotation.//_y_: Turns the model LEFT (positive) or RIGHT (negative) - 'Yaw'
modelFrontRotation.//_z_: Rolls the model SIDE-TO-SIDE (counter-clockwise is positive) - 'Roll'

//_BACKGROUND_: --- A single CSS string for the background gradient or color ---
//_INTERACTIVITY_: --- Controls for mouse and idle animations ---
//_EXTERNAL_FILES_: --- Files to inject, relative to this folder ---

lights.//_position_: Where the light is 'shining' FROM. (x, y, z)
lights.//_angle_: Width of the spotlight's cone in degrees (e.g., 45).
lights.//_penumbra_: Softness of the spotlight's edge (0.0 to 1.0).
